turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Criminal procedure in South Africa.
turn.1: When is a Preliminary inquiry necessary?
turn.2: If there has not been an arrest, the preliminary inquiry must take place within the time specified in the notice or summons, as the case may be.
turn.4: A preliminary inquiry is considered to be a first appearance as under section 50 of the CPA.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Chapter 7 contains a number of other provisions relating to procedures at preliminary inquiries.
turn.7: What are some of the provisions?

turn.10: If the case falls under Schedule 3, the DPP may in writing agree to diversion, if exceptional circumstances exist.
turn.11: What if the case is under Schedule 3?
